summary:
- Seek ventures to expand my skill-set and stay current with latest cutting-edge technologies.Leverage my strengths in consulting and development to support recurring work for previous employers and new clients.
- Recruited by startups and growing agencies to architect digital solutions,team models,estimations,and provide oversight on digital transformation projects across government,insurance,and healthcare industries.
- Lead a globally dispersed team of developers to successfully meet deadlines for three concurrent projects.
- Develop marketing tactics and SEO strategies to market and promote web traffic to client platforms.
- Contracted by a parent insurance company undergoing confidential M&A activity to build a streamlined decoupled website,keeping user experience unified and supporting strategic messaging of acquisitions.
Expedited the synergies of collaborative agile tooling.
Expedited the synergies of collaborative agile tooling.
